summary: H.R. 5677, the Rail Improvement Design and Expansion for Faster Advanced State Transportation Act (RIDE FAST Act), aims to extend the authorization for grants related to intercity passenger rail projects. Specifically, it amends the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act to extend funding under section 24911 of title 49, United States Code, through fiscal year 2032. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on October 3, 2025.
